policy.disable_app_update.title: Disable Application Updates
policy.disable_app_update.desc: Prevents the browser from updating itself.
policy.app_auto_update.title: Enable Auto Update
policy.app_auto_update.desc: If updates are allowed, enable automatic updates.
policy.disable_system_addon_update.title: Disable System Add-on Updates
policy.disable_system_addon_update.desc: Blocks background updates of system add-ons.
policy.disable_telemetry.title: Disable Telemetry
policy.disable_telemetry.desc: Turns off telemetry collection and reporting.
policy.disable_firefox_accounts.title: Disable Firefox Accounts
policy.disable_firefox_accounts.desc: Disables sync and Firefox Accounts UI.
policy.disable_pocket.title: Disable Pocket
policy.disable_private_browsing.title: Disable Private Browsing
policy.block_about_config.title: Block about:config
policy.block_about_profiles.title: Block about:profiles
policy.block_addons_manager.title: Block Add-ons Manager
policy.password_manager_enabled.title: Built-in Password Manager
policy.offer_to_save_logins.title: Offer To Save Logins
policy.primary_password_required.title: Require Primary Password
policy.primary_password_required.desc: Require a primary password to access saved logins.
policy.homepage.title: Homepage
policy.homepage.desc: Configure homepage URL and start page.
policy.default_download_directory.title: Default Download Directory
policy.download_directory.title: Download Directory
policy.always_ask_downloads.title: Always Ask Download Location
policy.always_ask_downloads.desc: Prompt for download path each time.
policy.extension_settings.title: Extension Settings
policy.extension_settings.desc: Fine-grained control of add-ons by ID and scope.
policy.extensions.title: Install Extensions (list of URLs/paths)
policy.extensions.desc: Force-install extensions from URLs or local paths.
policy.popup_blocking.title: Block Pop-ups
policy.certificates.title: Certificates
policy.certificates.desc: Install enterprise CAs and/or import OS trust store.
policy.proxy.title: Proxy
policy.doh.title: DNS over HTTPS
policy.doh.desc: Configure DoH provider and lock setting.
policy.captive_portal.title: Captive Portal
policy.disable_pdf_viewer.title: Disable Built-in PDF Viewer
policy.disable_feedback.title: Disable Feedback Commands
policy.disable_safebrowsing_downloads.de: Turn off malware download checks (not recommended).
policy.disable_firefox_studies.title: Disable Firefox Studies
policy.search_engines.title: Search Engines
policy.search_engines.desc: Set default engine and add custom engines.
policy.disable_password_reveal.title: Disable Password Reveal
policy.tracking_protection.title: Tracking Protection
policy.permissions.title: Permissions
policy.popups_allowed.title: Allow Pop-ups for URLs
policy.popups_allowed.desc: Whitelist sites exempt from pop-up blocking.
policy.preferences.title: Advanced Preferences (about:config)
policy.disable_profile_refresh.title: Disable Profile Refresh
policy.disable_profile_import.title: Disable Profile Import
policy.disable_profile_import.desc: Disallow importing data from other browsers.
policy.disable_set_desktop_background.de: Disable setting images as desktop background.
policy.webrtc.title: WebRTC
policy.kiosk_mode.title: Kiosk Mode
policy.printing.title: Printing
policy.disable_app_update_url.title: Disable App Update URL Override
policy.no_default_bookmarks.title: No Default Bookmarks
policy.disable_search_suggestions.title: Disable Search Suggestions
policy.disable_search_suggestions.desc: Disable search suggestions in the address bar.
policy.disable_geolocation.title: Disable Geolocation
policy.firefox_suggest.title: Firefox Suggest
policy.extensions_enabled.title: Extensions Enabled (IDs)
policy.extensions_enabled.desc: Restrict to a fixed list of extension IDs.
policy.disable_filesystem.title: Disable File System Access
